name: Moises Vallejos
text: Great hosting, clean place. Had a great time.

name: Michael Atkinson
text: I’m not even a member here and Samuel and Russell treat me like family. I come in town for work and they welcome me with open arms. Great people and very talented grapplers.

name: Nicholas Brattoli
text: I've been training here for more than six years and it's one of the better aspects of life.

name: john episcopo
text: If you are looking for instruction from a knowledgeable and professional instructor, this is the place.   I've been training with Professor Samuel Puccio for several years and couldn't even think about quitting due to the high quality of service I've received.  If you decide to sign up for classes, you will be welcomed with open arms and treated well.  He just moved into a new huge facility with lots of training space along with massive clean locker rooms to change into your uniform.  You will not find a better place to train in the Birmingham area.

name: edmond moore
text: I have been going to train there on and off for over 3 years.The one thing I love about this team is that they welcome you back everytime.When you walk thru the doors it honestly seems like you never left. I'm back home and now I plan on going full time. These instructors strive to make you feel at home, a better person, and most importantly do what you love to do in a stress free atmosphere.

name: Scott Holmes
text: This place is awesome.  Can't wait for things to open back up so we can get back to full rolling!

name: Christina Shirley
text: I've trained at this gym a handful of times. I also use to cut the grass at this gym. However, my name  was used by samuel and his family to arrange a marriage for his nephews legalization. I was blown away by such accusations that I called samuel to get to the bottom of it. Instead of samuel admitting to him using my name in an illegal manner, he used vulgar language and hung up on me. He then calls my dad to "get control of me" for standing up for myself. That's what he trains ppl to do, stand up for themselves, show respect, and be our best. With this being something he trained on, I thought he could have a mature conversation. I also expected an apology. I've never met anyone in Samuel's family so I knew that the information was coming from him. Samuel calls my dad, who has tried with him for years, and tells him he cant go to the gym anymore bc of me calling samuel out for illegal accusations. My dad remodeled Samuel's old gym and did a ton of work in the new gym for a lifetime membership. Now that membership is gone along with all respect I had for samuel. He later admitted to my brother that he and his wife did in fact discuss my name in this manner. He has not called to apologize but he has made threats to my dad bc all he cares about is his reputation. I just so happen to care about my reputation and my family also. I want everyone to be careful around this man bc hes not who he claims to be. I'm not saying he isnt a good trainer but there's more  to being a leader than training physically. Women need to be careful especially bc I'd never want them to convince someone to do anything illegal. The last thing samuel said is he was getting a lawyer so I got me a lawyer and all the proof anyone needs to know the truth. He thought an apology was too much to ask for. I never did anything to deserve this.

name: Brian Brock
text: Samuel is an exemplary teacher, fighter, and person! I highly recommend this place for both people confident in their skills and people terrified of the idea of BJJ! The community Samuel has built is top notch.

name: Eric James
text: I was passing through Birmingham and dropped in for a class with Samuel and his students. Everyone was real friendly, the facility was clean and the rolls were great. If you are passing through or thinking about taking up BJJ full time and live in the area, make sure you do it here!

name: Justin Cavender
text: I'm a BJJ blackbelt and have known and trained under Samuel for years hes always been very professional and as far as instruction goes he is world class!

name: J B
text: The great new gym is located right next to Rickwood Radio.

name: Josh Beste
text: I trained here for 4 months when I lived in Birmingham for work.  This is hands down the best gym I have trained at, Samuel is incredibly knowledgable and there are multiple black belts that attend the gym. They have beginner classes and no-gi classes as well. Everyone is very friendly and a joy to train with.

name: Teresita Valencia
text: Great environment to train in :) check it out!

name: Nicholas Eustace
text: Great class and great group of people.

name: Annie White
text: Great school and instructors.

name: Lauren B
text: Welcoming and very very knowledgeable.

name: Self Help CEE (TheRandomLife)
text:
My son (6) attended their youth class for what was about a month. For 140.00 per month, two days a week , and only one hour, we weren’t satisfied with how the classes were being taught. I can take my kid to launch in prattville and let him play longer for what we were paying.
Any way, perhaps we weren’t  aware of their “new” policy that they introduced with Covid, or it was not explained to us in detail, but 3 months later we are still being charged 140.00 per month for the classes which we haven’t attended. We even tried cancelling back in May and was told that we would be fully refunded, and no longer charged. As of today 7/21/21, we have been charged yet again, and have now been told that there’s nothing that can be done about it and they we will not be refunded.

Even Walmart has some kind of customer resolution procedure for situations like this. I don’t even see how they stay in business. If you are looking for a good martial arts place for your kids to go to GO SOMEWHERE else. They do not care about their customers, they only care about getting paid and robbing you of your time and money. The biggest mistake I made was signing up with them. If I could take legal action I would, because their policies are about robbery. They didn’t even apologize for the inconvenience.

I will NEVER come here, or recommend this them. I I am Highly upset, and unsatisfied with their business practices, and customer service. They will suffer greatly from doing business this way! If I could rate negative zero stars I would!

name: Shelby Hall
text: I joined to add something new to my exercise routine. I got the exercise and really enjoy the classes. The instructors do a good job and those in the class are a great group of people.

resp.text: Thanks Shelby! We sure are glad to have you training with us.

name: William Jones
text: With an amazing and caring military vet at the helm here, it's easy to see why this is the best place in town! I visited a few months back and was absolutely floored at the level of detail and caring they put into each student. I've been training martial arts all my life. If I move to Montgomery, this is where I'll train. I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thanks William! It was a pleasure getting to meet and train with you. Hope to see you back soon.

name: Shad Jones
text: I’ve been training a few months here and it is wonderful. The staff is friendly and very helpful. The trainers and Mr Bill excellent teachers. They work closely with you and always have your Saftey at mind.  I’m always excited to go to another class and see what’s next, and how far I can push my limits. I highly recommend them for any of their training offered!

resp.text: It's an honor to have you on the mat. You're exactly the kind of student that makes it all worthwhile.

name: David Leonard
text: Bill is a seasoned, solid martial artist.  His comprehensive knowledge and grounded character-based teaching style make for a dynamic learning experience.  Students at this school will be challenged to be not only better martial artists, but also to incorporate discipline and integrity into thier everyday lives.  In 15 years of training, I have found few schools of this caliber.

resp.text: Thanks for the vote of confidence my friend!

name: Nikki Crockett
text: Bill and his team are awesome. They have helped my son so much. He is no longer the shy reserved kid. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Nikki! Ethan is doing fantastic! He's come a long way.

name: Sandra Lewis
text:
Awesome leaders here! Can't say enough about the atmosphere. They temper a sense of family, fun and learning all in a teaching setting. Your not only learning an art that will protect you but also teaches so many other things that seem to be lost in today's world.
Discipline
Comradery
Lasting friendships
Leadership
Respect
Self Esteem
Fun
Goals
Values
and many more.

name: Logan Moorer
text: I’ve been training and helping out at Montgomery Martial Arts now for a couple of years, and I can say without a doubt that I have been greatly blessed by the family I’ve  gained there. The environment is positive and the focus is always on encouragement for the sake of self improvement.

name: Corey E (cmericks)
text: I am immensely pleased with this excellent program! I started bringing my kindergartner after a series of encounters with bullies at school. The program imbued confidence, practical tactics, muscle memory, and measured responsiveness. Bullies ceased to be an issue (i.e. confidence). Last weekend, I watched him instinctively (i.e. muscle memory) throw up his forearm (i.e. practical tactic) to block his brother's temper tantrum haymaker, then scoot back and assume a guard stance (i.e. measured responsiveness).

resp.text: Thanks Cory! Love it! Super glad to have you guys in our Academy.

name: Bill Mehm
text: Awesome gym with a great carriculum and instructors...evident by how much the student body has grown since opening. If you’re looking for an actual self defense school for yourself or your kid, this is it!

name: Steven Roberts
text: Great classes and people

resp.text: Thanks for the stars brother! Glad you are enjoying your journey!

name: Jacob Saylor
text: Great learning environment for both children and adults. If you're serious about martial arts, this is your best bet in the Montgomery area.

name: Gregory Williams
text: Great atmosphere and great training partners make Montgomery Martial Arts an all-around excellent training environment.

name: Anna Rosemen
text: So I came in once a few weeks back, and I stood waiting for them to come over to the counter so I could ask about the program to sign up and I stood there for a long time waiting and nothing. The people there saw me and they didn’t come over. They completely ignored me so I left.

resp.text: Hello Anna! I am so sorry to hear this. I really do not know how this could happen. There is always someone at the front counter unless there is an emergency. The head instructors are even trained to come over and assist you if they are not completely overloaded in class. However, if it happened please allow us to opportunity to make it up to you. I would like to offer you two weeks of free training to check things out and a personal private lesson. Please reach out to us during business hours and we will set up a time to make it happen. Thank you for your understanding.

name: Beccy Campbell
text: Amazing instructors that take a genuine interest in every student. My son has been taking Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Krav Maga with these instructors for over two years. The staff, students, and parents at the school are like family to us.  The programs at Montgomery Martial Arts not only focus on teaching technique and skill but also on building self esteem and character development as part of the martial arts education.  Flexible class schedules during the week that allow for training time that meets the needs of students and affordable tuition rates. I would highly recommend this school for martial arts students of all ages.

name: raymond cruz
text: Very friendly staff. Great place to train during my stay at Maxwell AFB!

name: Rachael godfrey
text: Master Smith is amazing! She is so patient and amazing with the kiddos. She knows exactly how to explain things on their level and she commands the room, engaging the entire class! Must check out :)

name: George Boyd
text: Amazing instructors and an amazing martial arts program! Master Smith and her instructors are the best in Montgomery!!

name: Joelen Ward
text: Wonderful place for kids!

name: David Baxter
text: Excellent place for toddlers

name: o gamer
text: My name is om prajapati

name: Tony Carleton
text: If you are close to Cullman Al this is the place to train.  Daniel will not only challenge you he will teach you to become the best practitioner you want to become.  He travels and teaches seminars across the county.  Great Instructor/Shihan/Sandan and runs a professional school. *****

name: Kyna Sterling
text: My girls have been training here for a few years. The Sensei's are knowledgeable and sincere. They have created a family that you'd want to be a part of.  I've watched my girls' become more disciplined, excited about learning new techniques, and their confidence has grown.

name: Trip Kirby
text: An awesome gym to learn martial arts.  Highly recommended.

name: Clay Malone
text: This is definitely the best Martial arts school in the area. It is run by high level and knowledgeable instructors who always seem to take time out of their day to help and answer questions even outside of class time. From the instructors to the students, it is a friendly and safe training environment. I  have been training at Triad for 14 years and I have no complaints. The school has helped me grow not just by teaching me karate, but also by teaching self discipline and respect. I would recommend this school to anyone, children and adults!

name: Ryan Newman
text: I trained here for over a year, and I can’t speak highly enough about this group. Instructors are very knowledgeable and the atmosphere is welcoming, even if you’ve never studied martial arts. It’s important to train somewhere you will progress and learn, but it’s just as important to enjoy the process and the people you train with day in and day out. I trained at the Madison location several times a week, and was always looking forward til the next time. Environment was very easy going and everyone was always willing to teach share info, new techniques, and answer my seemingly endless amount of questions. If I hadn’t moved away, I would still be rolling with this crew. Miss you guys!

name: Madison Clapp
text: This best place to learn martial arts and self defense! I have trained at trained at Triad for three years going on four and I couldn't be happier! I started training just to learn self defense and I got so much more, I gained so much confidence in myself not just in defending myself but in everything. Everyone at Triad Martial Arts are always respectful, kind and very supportive and are like a second family to me! I would recommend them to anyone!!

name: Seth Nugent
text: I highly recommend! All the instructors are extremely knowledgeable and they go above and beyond to help if you don't understand.  I've been training here 4 months and have seen a great deal of improvement in fitness and my understanding of martial arts. They also offer quite a few classes so you can train multiple times a week.

resp.text: Glad to have you here Seth! You're a great addition to the team!

name: K Yarbrough
text: Both of my daughters trained at Triad.  I cannot say enough about the training they received.  I feel that they both left the school (for college) prepared and able to defend themselves if necessary.  The curriculum developed by Johnny Lee Smith is second to none.  I will always send students to Triad.  Sensei Danny has been so good to my family and we really love this school

name: maiko beeson
text: They have high quality and detail oriented adults and kids classes. Kids programs allow a child to acquire the skills of not only how to protect themselves, but also how to be respectful to others. Training here is one of the best decisions I’ve made.

name: Andrew Z.
text: A fantastic place to learn the martial arts. You not only gain knowledge of the arts themselves, but strength and discipline as well. The environment is extremely welcoming and everyone will help you succeed. Highly recommended.

name: Faith Nugent
text: My husband trains here 3-4 times a week and comes home with so much excitement (and sweat). He's always wanted to get into martial arts and I am so happy to see him exploring something he's really passionate about.

name: Jessica Martin
text: I can't say enough about how great Triad is. I had my son's birthday party here. Daniel and the entire staff is exceptional. They had great activities planned and lots of patience for this young age group. We also had our cake made through them and it was fantastic and beautiful! One stop shop for the best party!! After having the party, we are definitely enrolling our son in Triad. If you're considering Martial Arts for your kids or yourself, please check them out first! You won't be disappointed. The facility is huge and really seems to offer alot. Great experience.

name: Matt Bynum
text: I signed up for a free class. The folks there were extremely welcoming!

name: Deafening Silence
text: I have been a part of the Triad family for the majority of my life. For 11 years I have trained and taught at Triad, learning about responsibility, leadership, loyalty, and the importance of a positive role model other than one's parents in shaping the character of the individual. My instructors have shaped who I am for the better and the family atmosphere at Triad extends beyond the bounds of the dojo. If you train here, you will have people who will support you and care about your development, inside and outside of class.

name: John Alred
text: I have trained there a few times traveling in out of the area.  They are a well organized group of professionals who take their craft very serious.  They make you feel welcomed and accommodating to whatever skill level you are at.  I have had nothing but the highest respect for the dojo and it’s staff.  Very well respected in the Dallas Texas area and spoke of highly by the Machado’s!  Hit them up if you are in the Alabama area for the best training you can get.

name: Michael Borden
text: Wonderful gym with a great family atmosphere.   I have trained at several gyms around the southeast over the past 29 years and Triad is on the best I have ever been involved with.

name: John O'Brien
text: Sensei Danny and the other instructors are world-class martial artists and even better people. Home away from home and the best in the area, hands down.

name: Alan Hunt
text: I have trained Jiu Jitsu at Triad for 3 1/2 years now. When I started I had zero background in grappling or wrestling. I got lots of mat time and even though I was submitted more times than I could ever hope to count, I never felt in danger or got injured. Every instructor and training partner I've ever grappled with at Triad has an amazing attitude. They are looking to make you better as they better themselves.

name: Zack Henry
text: This place is amazing. Most knowledgeable staff in the state, and they are wonderful people as well! Triad really has a welcoming environment and the people there support each other like a family. If you are considering martial arts for you or your children do yourself a favor and give Triad a shot.

name: William Terkeurst
text: My daughter has been training with Triad Martial Arts for 5 years now. We love the family atmosphere and the quality instruction. My daughter loves this place and looks forward to each class.

name: Cooper Lawrence
text: I've been training at Triad for over half my life. It's not just some martial arts school where they hand out belt everything is earned. And it's more than just a group of people it is a family.

name: Erin Kramer
text: Wonderful family atmosphere with knowledgeable and respectful instructors and training partners who always go above and beyond to help each other grow as martial artists.

name: Carlile McCoy
text: This is the best dojo in Madison.  They are family oriented.  Danny and the other instructors teach disciplined and respect of others in addition to martial arts.  Once you join you become part of the Triad family.  The staff is also wonderful in keeping the facility clean well organized.  It is also a very large facility so there is plenty of room for classes.  We love this dojo!

name: Chris Kramer
text: Amazing crew of instructors and training partners.  Respect, discipline and safety are always priority.

name: John Rogers
text: Abosultely terrible this place.  I have been in dojos all around the world.  I have competed in cage matches, in tournaments.  I have my own dojo in California and I am telling you right now, this place is absolutely awful.  As soon as I went in I knew I was in for a ride.  The place is so boring.  There are no workout instruments or anything.  The only thing there is a broken, anticuated workout room upstairs.  The lessons ae horrible.  I have seen many of these techniques and trust me, these do not work.  Avoid this place.  I have already told all my friends and family to not go here.  I have many students who spread the word of this place.  If you're wise you will choose another place.

resp.text:
Hi John,
I'm sorry you did not like the facility. I don't recall you coming in not do I have your name on any release but I could be making a mistake. I will stand by our training as we have professional fighters from our school as well as people competing in and winning at the highest levels of JiuJitsu. I hate that you didn't enjoy the training though. Where is your dojo in California at? I'm out that way often and am always looking to learn new technique! Thanks for your review!

name: Manilla Gorilla
text: A very traditional approach to martial arts, with respectful staff, I am so glad I came across this dojo.

name: Marcus Kirby
text: Excellent Martial Arts school. I highly recommend Danny!

name: Elizabeth Peltola
text: Best martial arts place around!

name: kellie kirby
text: My son has been taking karate with Triad for about 2 1/2 years and he looks forward to classes each week. His skills have improved along with his respect, control and dedication to a goal. In addition to the regular karate and jiu-jitsu, he is motivated to earn the money to pay for monthly private lessons. Sensei Danny has been an outstanding role model for my 11 year old.

name: Joe Parrish
text: Awesome instructors and training partners!

name: Eric Meckl
text:
Triad Martial Arts is the school of Johnny Lee Smith. Triad features traditional karate, kobudo, Brazilian jiu-jitsu, Equalizer women's self defense, and a Vale Tudo program ideal for those interested in mixed martial arts competition.

I began training at Triad in May, 2010. At the time, I was 33 years old, obese, suffering from high blood pressure, and badly out of shape. Training in their BJJ program has helped me to lose over 40lbs, and at age 36 I am now in better health than I was at 26. They have a great family atmosphere, ego-free training environment, and truly world class instruction.

If you have any interest in learning martial arts in northern Alabama, this is the place to be. Largest martial arts facility in the state. Highest ranked BJJ black belt in the state. Most BJJ black belts of any dojo in the state. Only Pan Am champion in state history. Vale Tudo program has already produced MMA pros Daniel O'Brien, Stephen Wilhite, and Matt Ward with more on the way.

name: Alan wilson
text: I do not and will not support Mr. Smith because he wrongfully supports Officer Parker.

name: Dan Griffiths
text: This gym lacks respect... Find a different gym to train at.

name: Marie Zeller
text: Best decision we made. The confidence he gained is unbelievable. The extra activities like parents night and parties reward the kids for working so hard. The staff truly cares and wants to help the kids. They go above and beyond. After a year my husband joined up in the adult classes and now our youngest is also going. Its become a family thing. Apsolutely worth it!

name: Qwuanyel Rodgers
text: Great group of people. Very knowledgeable.

name: Latika Smith
text: My Godson takes classes here. They are all very professional and patient; and they always start on time.

name: Torrance Taylor
text: Absolutely wonderful environment for kids and family alike who are interested in self defense and self betterment. My son loves it here!

name: Takeya Wortham
text: Great karate class for kids

name: Crystal Williams
text: Our son started the Tiny Tiger classes October 2018 and I can honestly say this has been a great decision.   Everyone is friendly and my son absolutely loves it.  The instructors are amazing.  We couldn’t ask for a better place to have our son learn!

name: JON GIBBS
text:
Expert staff is knowledgeable and helpful for all levels of experience and skill.
My 7 year old went from nervous to fearless in 4 classes! I also have great appreciation for their emphasis on respect, honor, and accountability. They are teaching our youth some very valuable life skills and lessons in addition to building self confidence and giving them the ability to defend themselves. Highly recommend Mobile ATA!

name: Amanda Courtney
text:
We have been members since January 2019. My daughter has found a great group of friends, it has helped with her focus, and rebuilt her confidence.

I've been in kickboxing since mid-March and have lost 30 lbs!

All the instructors are knowledgeable and fun! Love this place so much!

name: OnnaBellYT Yas
text: I’ve really enjoyed the friendliness of the atmosphere. The instructors are helpful courteous respectful and motivational. I’ve learned a lot about self defense. I love my classes and look forward to each and every class. I recommend them to everyone who wants to learn how to defend themselves. Thank you

name: Stephanie Leftwich
text: We started our son at ATA Hillcrest this past Fall and he has absolutely loved it.  We could not ask for better instructors to help guide him in learning some positive behaviors and martial arts skills.  We enjoyed the experience so much that my husband and I joined and started the adult kickboxing classes.  It is a great way for us as a family to do something together and the ATA Family has been so welcoming and we love it there so much!

name: K i t t y _ A l l y _ P o t a t o
text: This is the best place I could’ve brought my daughter! She is so much stronger mentally and physically. Her confidence has improved majorly!! Highly recommend! Also, we’re treated like family.

name: Courtney Foote
text: I've been taking kickboxing classes for over 6 weeks now and every single class has been a truly fantastic experience. The staff and instructors are professional and extremely caring. I was very nervous before my first class but they immediately made me feel at home and comfortable. They are always encouraging and supportive. I really love that in classes, they never yell or make fun. They always smile and spur me on to do better.

name: Dave deGruy
text: ATA has been a wonderful experience for my grandson, Brady.  Miss Barlow is great with the young kids (Tigers).  All of the instructors are knowledgeable and work well with children.  Would recommend to anyone looking for discipline and structure in their child's life.

name: Matthew Sharpe
text: My son looks forward every week to his classes. I have enjoyed watching the instructors work with him and develop his skills. I think we started a week or two behind some of the other students and the staff worked with him to catch him up and get him ready to test for his first color belt. I highly recommend Mr. Johnson, Mr. Craft, Ms. Barlow, Ms. Foote, Ms. Walton and all of the other instructors at the school. The school app has been very helpful in getting my son to practice outside of class. Try this school out - I think you will be pleased!

name: Ali Zeidan
text: Great staff that does a fantastic job teaching martial arts to kids and adults.

name: Clint Padgett
text: This is a great place with excellent staff. My son joined Tiny Tigers in December and never wants to miss a day. The expertise of the instructors very noticeable. It's a safe facility. The kids are becoming more confident, disciplined, and focused with each session. And most of all it's fun!!!

name: Sherry Reed
text: We love being a part of Mobile ATA. The instructors are great and encouraging with the students. We have seen such a positive change in our daughter's confidence since she began taking classes. Not only is it a challenging sport physically, the students learn life skills that will benefit then throughout their lives. I highly recommend this place!!

name: Lauren Viere
text: Highly recommend! My son just completed his first cycle and we very pleased. Instructors are very caring and encouraging. We will continue to be a part of the ata family ☺️

name: Ms. Griffin
text: My son’s experience at Mobile ATA has been great. The instructors are patient and understand how to deal with a lack of self esteem. I highly recommend sending your kids here to learn martial arts!

name: Natalie Hall
text: We LOVE ATA! The whole family joined in January. Kick boxing is great for both me and my husband. Taekwondo is perfect for our child. I am so impressed with the friendliness of the staff and the professional atmosphere. I highly recommend ATA to all families in the Mobile area.

name: Erin Morton
text: I just started my 9 yr old son a couple of weeks ago. So far he loves it! It's already helping to boost his confidence and coordination. He looks forward to each class to see what he will learn next. The staff is friendly and works well with him. Great facility.

name: Catherine Anderson
text: I personally love ATA hillcrest for my son Corey. In just a short amount of time I saw confidence and self-esteem built up in my son. They have taught him respect and self discipline. Not to mention the staff is amazing. We love ATA

name: Lina English
text: Seriously the best thing I could have done for my son. He loves it and it gives him a goal to look forward too. Mr. Johnson is so awesome and helpful! Love this place!!!!!

name: Jamie L Tew
text: I am so happy I chose ATA martial arts for my children. They absolutely love it. Yesterday they earned their orange belt and I can't wait to watch them succeed to the next level. Thank you instructors

name: Wendy Davis
text: Eyan looks forward to class each week.  I enjoy seeing how the instructors interact so easily with the kids.  They enjoy the classes just as much as the kids do.  We love it!!

name: Kassia Poties
text: I brought my sons to ATA to give them motivation and inspiration after losing their father. It has been the absolute best decision I have made. They look forward to coming every week and work very hard towards becoming black belts. I love how they not only learn techniques, but learn skills that help them to become well behaved and respectful everyday and every where.

name: Casey Stanfill
text: Excellent facility, excellent staff, excellent experience all the way around. Our whole family has been participating and I can see improvements to our individual lives holistically.

name: Felicia Graf
text: My 10 yrs. old twins and I have been going to ATA on hillcrest for about 3 months. They are loving the karate classes and I have been enjoying kickboxing. The staff and instructors at ATA Hillcrest are phenomenal. They are always pleasant. My children's grades have improved in school and they are always excited to go to class. I highly recommend ATA Hillcrest.

name: Dana Mosley
text: I enrolled my 4 and 5yr old here and they absolutely LOVE IT!! My 5yr old was telling my 4yr old what good ninjas do on the way home from our first class so I am very optimistic this is going to make a big difference in their overall behavior.

name: Ifa Holiday
text: My family and I have been attending the school since February and we absolutely love it! The staff is friendly and do their best to make us feel welcome. The best part is while my boys are doing karate in their class, I'm able to get my workout in the kickboxing class! My boys have gained life skills, respect, and discipline oh such a short time. I'd recommend ATA Martial arts to anyone looking for a great place for your whole family to get fit and have fun!

name: Chrissy Benefield
text: We love ATA! Our son looks forward to each and every class. The structured yet fun and exciting environment provides a great way of learning. Each and every staff member knows every kids name and helps them achieve their goals!

name: mary shepherd
text: We have been a part of ATA since Feb 2018 and it has been such a fun journey for my son, Braxton! He has become so much more confident, and he truly enjoys karate! I love seeing him in his element-- when a child is passionate about something, and they have instructors who are equally as passionate-- it's amazing to witness! We love ATA!!!

name: Jessie Hale
text: Hillcrest ATA has been a godsend to my family, the instructors are all a tremendous help with our son, he started as a tiny tiger and recently was awarded most likely to become a master. You guys have really changed him in a positive way, he is so much more confident in himself and we thank you. We recently signed up our little girl and already see improvements in her as well.

name: Kevin Anders
text: Mobile ATA has been such a good choice for our family!!  Our son has been in classes for about 3 months now, and the improvement we see in his focus, discipline, and positivity is dramatic!!  It is such a blessing to see him really take a keen interest in such a fun activity!!

name: autumn tillman
text:
We have been a part of ATA for almost 2 months. We have thoroughly enjoyed every moment. Our son is not a competitive person, so regular sports were never enjoyed by him. ATA has given him a new opportunity. We love how organized and friendly everyone is at ATA.

** It has now been almost a year and we are still thrilled with ATA. Updated 6/22/2016**

name: Tanya Fulgham
text: I love mobile ata! The instructors are very nice and helpful. I just moved my boys over here, and I can't wait to be apart of the ATA family!

name: Ashley Young
text: We love Mobile ATA - Dawes! Our son asks everyday if it’s Tuesday or Thursday. He loves attending the classes and the instructors always makes sure our child learns in a fun and professional environment.

name: ashley_brown1978 Tankman0309
text: At a and all of its instructors and staff are great. The price is awesome and you even get a great deal for enrolling your whole family. My son has enjoyed the past year and a half with much more to come.

name: Ann Rhodes
text: My grandson & daughter are both members. We love the staff, facility and overall atmosphere! I highly recommend this place to everyone. Discipline, confidence and kindness are taught on a daily basis.

name: Hannah Wood
text: Fantastic family fun, an amazing workout, and very life changing. The Instructors are very helpful and support you all the way. No matter what your goal is. From getting your Black Belt, maybe losing extra weight, or even learning self defense- ATA will help you achieve your goals and give you a sense of pride, self confidence, and honor. Being a part of ATA is being a part of a family.

name: S. Sims
text: We have been fairly pleased with ATA. However, we will look into other karate schools when our contract is over. There is favoritism shown to kids and adults alike. If you're not "in" with their crowd, you are barely even noticed. Other than that, it seems fine. Three-four more months in our contract, and we will move elsewhere.

name: Jennie Dexter
text: We signed our 4 year old son up today and we received AMAZING customer service!!!! They were very welcoming and informative, great prices and special! My son LOVED his first day!

name: Brandy Rowell
text: I look forward to kickboxing every week! It has taken my fitness goals to the next level. The workouts always push you to your max but are never predictable! Staff is always friendly and supportive! I also love all of the "extra" events for members (theme weeks, pool parties, family nights). I cant wait until my daughter is old enough to take taekwondo here! I see all of the hard work that goes into the kids and the positive responses from them. Its just an all around great place to attend!

name: David Horn
text: Love this place! The Taekwondo instruction has made a huge difference in my 6 yr old (been going 1 yr), and my wife and I take Kickboxing and Self Defense classes too. We are shedding pounds, having fun, in an amazing environment (supportive, safe and no judgment) and learning how to stay safe- couldn't be more happy! My Son is learning respect, focus and planning to achieve. I give it 6 Stars!

name: Savana Lamb Louviere
text: I started kickboxing this month and I love it! Great stress relief. I liked the staff so much I signed my daughter up for karate. Nice place, great staff, and encouraging atmosphere

She enjoys being abble to defend herself, the companionship, the friendship and most of all the goal of being a black belt. We have bouts of anxiety attacks after something goes awry and she doesn't do as well as others but she never gives up. Thank you, to all of you, for understanding that her tears are just doubts and for giving your time to explain what she needs to improve on. You are all a blessing for giving her a voice and the strength to use it. #GirlPower #Ninja #BehaveLikeABlackBelt #AnxietyDoesntDefineUs

text: I took my son here to inquire about starting classes. resp.text: We apologize for your poor experience, Ms. Hall! While we understand that our team can get very busy and mistakes can happen, we agree that not being greeted today was unacceptable. It's our goal to provide our members with the best possible experience, and we would love to have a second chance to make it right. If you're interested, please give us a call at 633-5808, and ask to speak to a manager.

Oxford Taekwondo is an awesome school for learning martial arts.  My son began classes here about a year ago and absolutely loves it.

The class also instills life values that builds character such as dignity, respect, perseverance and a host of life skills.  I would recommend this class.

name: rachael hurtz
text: They lack communication. I tried to discontinue payments for months and they wouldn’t let me . No one would answer the phones . I left voicemails and emails and they claimed to get new management.  They continued to charge me and said they will only do continue payments through email no matter if you show up in person or phone . They had no problem taking my money in person though. My son only went a few times and we’ve paid over $500 and they refused to refund my last month even though they were contacted prior .  I have nothing to say in regards to how they train, they just weren’t large enough yet to have my sons age range . Just honestly unhappy with the way they carry their business after I hung tight through the pandemic and hurricane closures with them.

resp.text: You are really spinning things here.  You signed up for a 3 month term.  You were told that at the end of the term the account would be month-to-month, like all gym memberships & martial arts schools. At the end of the term you didn't send us a cancellation notice in writing, which we told you to do, so it rolled over to another month.  Then as soon as you sent us the 30 day cancellation notice we cancelled the account.  You didn't "hang tight through the pandemic" either since we weren't open and you didn't sign up until after the gym was reopened following the reopening of gyms in the state of Alabama.  That is just a complete lie on your part. As far as your son goes he needs the discipline that comes from martial arts training. We suggest finding him a program as soon as possible and not letting him quit early.  We offered to give you guys a free month for the extra month that you paid even though it was your error to not cancel the account.

name: Bridges Bedgood
text: The best BJJ/MMA training team around!  Team based, outstanding instructors, and family oriented.  Great place for beginners or advanced students!

name: Morgan Wagner
text: Jimmy is very unprofessional. After years of what seems to be running this gym, he still has issues with his phone and email services. I too am having trouble closing out my account due to his unprofessionalism.  I do not recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: We responded to your request to freeze the account within 24 hours and you never responded back to confirm an amount of time.  All you had to do was respond with however many months you wanted to freeze the account, but you didn't.  It would have been very simple. As soon as you sent the 30 day request to cancel we processed it.  Good luck in the future.

text: Our family LOVES the people here and the time they take with each one of our children and family members! Very nice staff, Very clean place, family friendly environment! resp.text: Thank you for the kind words🙏

Can't wait for them to move to a bigger place and more people can see their success.

name: TheElectricRayborn
text: Great atmosphere, family environment! Recommend to everyone I see!

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming to see us for a fun time. We're glad to be that to you! - Matt Halfacre, Owner

name: Matt Howell
text: An amazing atmosphere for kids and adults, if you're looking for a way to get in shape and have some comradery Roufusport Foley is for you. The children's Jiu-jitsu program is fantastic and has given our children more confidence then they have ever had.

resp.text: Matt, thanks for coming to see us! So glad to hear it's always a killer time. Hope to see you soon for a fun class or some gym time! - Matt Halfacre, Owner

name: Flo Rivers
text: I adore all the staff and coaches! They take the goals you have set and help you surpass them :) All while building relationships with their clients.

resp.text: Flo, we adore you as well! Thanks so much for sending this our way. So pleased it was a great visit. Happy to help you work towards those goals -- thanks for inviting us on the journey. - Matt Halfacre, Owner

name: Team Fountain Admin
text: Awesome atmosphere! Great instructors and coaches!

name: Frederic Lecut
text: Best martial arts school in the Wiregrass offers classes in Yoshukai Karate,  Kenjutsu (samurai swordsmanship) and Taichi.

name: Julia Daugherty
text: This is the place to go if you want traditional karate. It's a great community and environment and you learn real karate. The teachers are great, people who want you to do your best.

name: Laura Adkison
text: Excellent training.  Offers adult and kid classes.  Mike Culbreth is a great instructor with over 30 years experience.

name: Scott Daugherty
text: If your looking for traditional karate look no further. Outstanding classes offered for both child and adult. Sensi is a 8th degree black belt and he other instructors are second to none. Great environment the strives for excellence and simple the best price in town.

name: David Caddell
text:
Great place and great atmosphere!
Instructors are passionate about the Yoshukai style which benefits all students.

name: Carrie Ann Mattimore
text: My boys love Yoshukai! It's a great dojo with friendly people that make you feel as if you have a second home.  And the Sensei's are very good with the children and they offer adult classes too!

name: Johnny H
text: If you're interested in BJJ/MMA, martial arts and self defense, you have to check this place out. The head instructor, Daniel O'Brien, is a WORLD CLASS martial artist and has a very unique approach and a deep knowledge 2nd to none. You'll also find the other instructors and the students to be some of the nicest and most welcoming people you'll ever meet. Whether you're thinking about an incredible place for your kids, a challenging experience for yourself as an athlete, or a gradual and non intimidating dojo to learn how to defend yourself, you will find all of these and more at Triad.

name: Zac Burks
text: Excellent teaching. Excellent leadership. Excellent classes. Excellent overall vibe. Highly recommend!

name: Richard Keller
text: I took Teakwondo for 15 years, and made it to a 2nd degree black belt. I was a little hesitant to sign my daughter up just because it was a different style of Karate. Daniel O'Brian is a brilliant instructor, and teacher. He fights MMA with an outstanding record and still takes the time ask to see my daughter's report cards. You will not find a better place for your child to grow. Thank you mister O'Brian. You won't find anything better than Triad in Cullman.

name: Jon Garner
text: Best martial arts school in Alabama.  The instructors are top notch and dedicated to their students.

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Jerry Ash
text: This dojo literally saved my life. I've never met a group as solid community wise and experience. Shihan Daniel O'Brian has a mastery at teaching to go along with his world renowned knowledge of his art.

name: Christopher Weaver
text: Great place! I wish I could live here! Lol

name: Alabama Brew Review Podcast
text: Fantastic dojo, I would go as far to say the best in the state, if not the entire south east.

name: Isaac Whote
text: This is one of the best dojo to go too

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Kelly Childers
text: Our daughter has attended Triad for over 2 years now and it has been an amazing experience for her! Triad has amazing instructors who truly care about seeing their students excel in Martial Arts. We are so honored that our daughter is part of such an outstanding group and that she is being taught by the best of the best! Triad is more than a place to learn Martial Arts, It's truly a family 🔺

name: Markkatie Bates
text:
We started training at triad little over a year ago
It’s a great encouraging environment to learn martial arts . Taught by the very best. It’s something my son and I can do together. I always played football throughout school and valued the lessons learned. But I believe at triad kids and adults learn and build on those same lessons of overcoming adversity and doing your best. Another great thing taught is respect for yourself and also your fellow man.
Students are held to a high standard and it’s worth it

name: Heather Conn
text: This place has been the very best thing for my son! Triad has taught him self control, self confidence, coordination and countless new skills! I mean it when I say they have made a genuine change in my childs disposition! He looks up to Daniel so much and admires him for his hard work and discipline! You can not go wrong enrolling your child!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Stephen McDaniel
text: Stopped in here to train while out of town for work! They had a killer workout and training session and were also very informative with their technique (top notch)! They were very welcoming and excited to have me. I would fully recommend training at this dojo if you live here or are traveling through.

name: Barbie Garner
text: Great instructors!!!  Highly recommend Triad!

name: CEP III Gaming
text: Loved being there! Can’t wait to go back. Very knowledgeable with stand up and ground game. Very respectful environment and honorable dojo. It’s truly life changing and I’m itching to go back and learn more.

name: Amy Stancil
text: Great place to bring your kids to learn martial arts, discipline, and honor. Awesome teachers! My daughter has been taking karate for 6 months and LOVES it! Highly recommend!

name: Michael Bates
text:
Triad is an absolutely wonderful place to learn Martial Arts. But you won't just learn how to defend yourself there. You'll learn how to discipline and respect yourself too.

And you won't find just a dojo filled with hulking athletes. You'll find a second family; brothers and sisters who train each other, teach each other, support each other, and respect each other, while challenging each other to grow and improve as martial artists. Be you child, teenager, or adult, this is the best place to learn and train in martial arts.

name: David House
text: Excellent teachers who work well with children as well as teens and adults. Highest skill levels displayed by teachers who are know throughout the US for their abilities and knowledge. Multiple blackbelts assist the students of any skill level. Great way to get in shape at any age. Many different class times and great women's class.

name: tabinal1
text: My kids went to Triad for years and now my husband goes. We all love the people and appreciate the knowledge that was shared there. You will never feel vulnerable if you have trained at Triad.

name: Timothy Doolittle
text: Triad is one of the best schools to train at in Alabama. Daniel teaches an effortless jiujitsu that is amazing. He displays the true beauty in the art. The people to train here are humble that creates a real environment for learning.

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: CJ Pugh
text: My son has been attending Triad for almost 2 years.  The teachers are awesome with the kids!  Shihan Daniel does a great job teaching the kids self-discipline and respect along with the martial arts instruction.

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Andrew Dutton
text: I’ve lost thirty pounds since joining. As far as American karate dojo’s go, this is the spot. You’ll earn each belt, as well as great friends and a new found confidence. I encourage anybody looking or curious to join to make the jump 100%.

name: Gregory Hickok
text: Daniel is a great teacher.  The rest of the staff is friendly and does a great job with my son.  Brodie loves his class and it has given him discipline and confidence.

name: Melanie Byrd
text: I can't say enough positive words about Triad Martial Arts Academy!  My son has been attending karate classes there for a year and a half now, and he loves every minute of it!  He has learned discipline, the importance of physical activity and healthy eating, as well as valuable karate and self defense skills.  Shihan Daniel O'Brien is lovingly tough with the children, teaching them respect for each other, their parents, teachers, the importance of good grades, and responsibly for their actions.  We signed our son up for karate classes, but he gets so much more than just karate instruction.  If I could give more stars than 5, I certainly would!

name: Josh Jordan
text: A very good leader. I have horrible shoulders and he has showed me things to do to not stress them as much. Highly recommended!! Also loves Police, Military, Fire, and EMS!!

name: Lacey Lynch
text: Very nice and knowledgeable in Martial Arts.

name: Eric Meckl
text: If you have the desire to pursue the martial arts, you won't find a better instructor than Shihan Daniel O'Brien. Whether your goal is to become a professional MMA fighter, or just to make friends & get in shape while learning practical self-defense...Triad has everything you need to be successful. They offer a great family-friendly atmosphere, and world class instruction for all ages.

name: Richard Crabb
text: Kids love it here.  No bologna straight to the point teaching.  Always open for questions and very welcoming!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Devin Henry
text: We have been at Triad for 8 months now. My little boy loves it and has learned so much. I highly recommend this place, we are family!!:)

name: Fabian Siegl
text: Absolutely loving this place. The environment is awesome and the people there are amazing. Very helpful and humble. Would recommend it for anybody.

name: maiko beeson
text: Great place to grow your characters and your martial arts techniques! High quality teachers and detail oriented classes.

name: Leah Miller
text: We love Triad. Sheehan Daniel is such a hard worker and my kids respect him so much. My oldest has grown so much in such a short time with Triad.

name: lynda thornsbury
text: This is one of the best places ever!!!  They are great with children and perfect for adults.   I highly recommend everyone to try this place out!!!!

name: Ezekiel McBrayer
text: Best local dojo to train. Everyone there is very respectful and does everything possible to help you learn and stay on track.

name: Lucy Borja
text:
I have been coming to this place for a long time and have a tremendous amount of respect for everyone here! This place is family to me! Even though I cant be there as much as I want to! Lol
-Tony Phillips

name: jennifer moore
text: Awesome instructor and staff. I felt right at home. I highly recommend Triad!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Beth Carpenter
text: My son has trained at Triad for over a year. The staff are fantastic..the dojo is kept clean and the classes are top notch. He has grown as a student..and as a young man. I can't reccomend Triad enough.

name: Viper Exists
text: My son began his training here in 2013 at the age of four. The only dojo to accept little ones. He completed the Lil’ Dragons class and will be testing for his yellow belt tomorrow. He has learned so much from this amazing group of trainers. I highly recommend Triad Martial Arts in Cullman to anyone seriously seeking to train!

name: Michael Obrien
text:
Great place great people
I highly recommend this place
Become a member of the TRIAD family 😄

name: Dustin Leonard
text: The best thing to ever happen to me! The best teachers. The best jiujitsu. The best attitudes. Just the best! If you have children that need to learn respect or just have energy they need to channel this is the place. Want to get into shape? This is the place! Mma your goal look no further! Anything can be accomplished with the tools you can get here.

name: Jason Pilkington
text: Amazing instructors, great classmates. If you want to better yourself & gain confidence, Triad Martial Arts Academy is the place to train. Jiu Jitsu, Karate, & Vale Tudo classes are all great!

name: Jonathan and April Graves
text:
We as a family have been training at Triad since 2014. The family atmosphere is wonderful. There is a lot of respect trained and shown to all students. You learn quickly that a belt at Triad is truly earned, not just given like many schools. Everyone is willing to help each other learn and grow.
Shihan Daniel O’Brien is one of the most brilliant BJJ practitioners and teachers. His ability to teach and encourage, especially the little ones, is amazing.
Our Kyoshi, Johnny Lee Smith, is also the founder of SSGT (Strategic Self-Defence & Gunfighting Tactics) which is training used my law enforcement throughout the southeast.
If you or your kids are interested in the martial arts, there is no better place!

name: Brigette Jarrett
text: I’ve been training at Triad Martial Arts in Cullman for a total of three years but specifically in jiu jitsu for one year. I’ve gained so much valuable knowledge and detail training under Shihan Daniel O’Brien that I will carry with me for the rest of my life. Very welcoming students that train at this school. Couldn’t ask for better instructors and training partners!

name: Barbie Garner
text: Great instructors for all levels!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Harlie Moon
text: If you are looking to experience Martial Arts in its purest form you should give Triad a try... One of the best BJJ schools in the world... Everyone is very helpful and knowledgeable...

name: Jordan O'Brien
text: Daniel O'Brien is the best in the state no doubt! I wouldn't take my kids anywhere else! Why would you want training from anyone else, when the best is an option??

name: Christine Lamb
text: I have watched my daughter blossom and gain self confidence over the last 6 months. She never wants to miss a class!

name: kellie kirby
text: My son has been training here over 9 years - excellent instruction, personal development, character, confidence, self defense. Proud of the young man he has become with the leadership from Triad

name: daniel obrien
text: Number 1 school in the state. Most black belts under one school. Trained closely with Wonder Boy.

name: Raptorclan
text: I've been there for four months now.  They train you hard. I am a orange belt now.

name: John O'Brien
text: Best martial arts training and instructos. Period.

name: jonathan baty
text: Triad is an amazing place to train with amazing training partners!!

name: Josette O'Brien
text: Triad Martial Arts treats you like family.They are the most decorated school in Alabama. Daniel O'Brien is the only in the state to win the jiu jitsu world's Gold at brown belt in 2010.Triad was founded by Johnny Lee Smith. Johnny is also the founder of SSGT, combat and self defense training for law enforcement. Triad cares about their students and teaches them how to defend themselves and grow confidence as well as friendships with great honor and loyalty to the dojo and the art. Thank you Triad Martial Arts for being a wonderful powerful beacon for Cullman and the state.

name: Don Prince
text: Top level Jiu-Jitsu. Best Jiu-Jitsu in Alabama bar none.

name: Dan Griffiths
text: This gym lacks respect... There are better places to train.

name: TheBuzzsaw16
text: Great school with the best instructor in the state!

name: Neil Whiticar
text: Had a seminar with him, very approachable, great teacher

name: john m
text: Best place to train, period

name: ForgiveAJ-Yt —
text: Very patient with the children :)

name: Brandi Jones
text: My son has been attending Tiger Rock since 2018. He started karate at 4 years old in Illinois when we lived there. We moved back to Alabama in 2017. He has grown tremendously in his martial art skills! He worked his way up to the L1 Black Belt ranking in December of 2020. This took diligence and commitment after starting at a yellow belt for the 2 time (because he had to start all over again coming from a different karate school). Tiger Rock is not a skip and a hop for us. We travel at least 40-45 minutes to each lesson. So on those nights we get home late. But it’s apart of our lifestyle for now and believe me it’s well worth it! On a day to day basis my son is maturing and becoming more confident and focused as a young man as well as in his academics. I’ve also noticed his expectations are higher and he even sets goals and challenges his discipleship. What I like most about Tiger Rock is the feel of a family oriented environment. Anytime I have questions no matter who the staff member is the response is always friendly and polite. Communication is paramount and Tiger Rock ensures on a consistent basis that you are included in the family!

name: Adam Madison
text: Our daughter (8 years old) loves Tiger Rock and is so excited for her next belt graduation. She began in February ‘21 and is already showing dramatic improvement. The staff has been wonderful throughout the entire process; making sure to get one-on-one (or very small groups) training with our daughter and not just a faceless student in a room of 30 kids. Employees remembers names and interacts with the kids before/after practice to make them feel welcome. They are not pushy about enrollment and allow many trial sessions to see if the program is right for your daughter/son. Would highly recommend!!! 5/5!

name: Jessica Spowart
text: May kids and I began our Martial Arts journey at the beginning of 2021 but I truly wish we would have done it sooner! The instructors are knowledgeable, encouraging and inspiring. The classes are a great work-out and the self-defense skills make me feel empowered. There is no doubt that we are learning physical skills but we are also growing and developing a mentality that can help when obstacles come our way. Our fellow classmates are friendly and encouraging. It truly feels like a community! All three of us thoroughly enjoy being a part of Tiger Rock! We are 8, 18 and 41. You are not to old to start! Come join us!

name: Ashley Gill
text: My son (8) has been training at Tiger Rock for close to 2 years. In January of 2020 my daughter (11) decided to join her little brother after sitting through many of his classes. They both LOVE the instructors, the classes, and the workout. They enjoy competing in tournaments as well. We were so grateful that tiger rock never missed a beat during the pandemic and when everything else in their lives got canceled, tiger rock did not!

name: Jen Clem
text: Great opportunity for athletic activity in a fun, empowering environment. Owner and head instructor Mr. Holt emphasizes leadership and teamwork life skills mixed in with martial arts training. The team of instructors create a positive, welcoming environment. This has been a great experience for my daughters to learn self defense and discipline.

name: Lindsey Thomas
text: We love the Northport Tiger Rock family! They are ALL so nice, friendly , supportive and helpful!! My son and daughter are excited everyday we go. The staff are very inclusive and great teachers of strength, skill and discipline.

name: pamela esco
text: Both of my kids takes classes and I highly recommend them.  The facility is always clean and the staff is highly skilled and professional. We love it!

name: Jennifer Wells
text:
All of the instructors are wonderful with the children! I promise, they will have someone there who your child will grow very attached to.

While my boy can make friends with anyone, my daughter is a sensitive wall flower. We were worried how she would do in a large class, but we've found that she always lights up when Mr. Collins comes to give her one on one teaching..

name: Rachel Taylor
text: Tiger Rock is so much more than martial arts. My daughter is learning life skills that she can use forever. I like how there is always a goal to work towards when it comes to the belt testing. Plus it is good exercise!

name: Nichole Cavin
text: This is an amazing academy for students to learn Taekwondo and life lessons not regularly taught anymore.  The instructors take the time to get to know the students and their families.  They share their lives with the families at Tiger Rock and willing share in the lives of the students.  We have made life long friends through Tiger Rock and have enjoyed the experience over the last 3 years.

name: Lindi Ragon
text: One of the best decisions you could make for your kids. We signed up for the summer program a couple of years ago and it really has been such a blessing. Not only martial arts but life skills as well.

name: Carl Hathorne (CHathorne)
text: Tiger rock is awesome. The staff are great. I can’t say enough good things about the entire group. They have handled the pandemic like pros with zoom classes and social distancing for in studio classes. Every one the instructors are genuinely good people. Bring your kids here for great exercigse and training with the benefit of good role models, that’s hard to find these days.

name: jamie redd
text:
My son started here when he was five years old he is ten now he loves it.The staff are awesome they care about the students like they were one of there own.
My son has gained self confidence,friends, discipline and self defense over the years. I would highly recommend this for your child  you won’t regret it I promise.

name: Juanita Zavala
text: I just wanted to say "Thank you!" to the Tiger Rock team. All the zoom classes and care you have taken to get to a new normal is great. My son has 4 classes plus a private lesson every week. I truely believe this has provided much needed sanity in times of pandemic, especially for my teen!! You guys rock!!

name: Terra Smith
text:
Our family loves Tiger Rock in Northport!!! Mr. Holt and the crew there are amazing!

Update: Our son has been in the Northport Tiger Rock Academy since he was 4 and now he is almost 9! Our family can not even begin to tell you how wonderful every staff member has been!! Our not so little guy is now a Black Belt!!! He is in the Leadership program and we love the new program!
I have to also give kudos to how Mr. Holt and the team handled the pandemic! 🙌  Thank you all so very much for sticking with us through all of the ups and downs.
The Smith family.

name: Michelle Moss
text: I have had the privilege of watching my son grow through his training with Tiger Rock over the past 6 years. They are genuinely caring and involved in each student. It is all about the mind and the body and we are so grateful for this staff and wonderful training facility!

name: Jayme Tindle
text: Though I'm an older student the instructors do there best to make me as good a student as the younger students. They are all so professional and patient with the students to make sure they are doing the techniques correctly.

name: Kimberly Bush
text: Great place! They teach more than just punching & kicking...they teach discipline, respect, self control, obedience, etc. However, it is very, very expensive.

name: Terri Lane Robertson
text: Great place! Incredible staff and clean facility. Highly recommend for all ages.

name: Becky May
text: My children and I have been a part of the tiger rock family for 4 years now. The staff has been a blessing to my family both in training and personally. We just had our first birthday party with them and it was the most enjoyable party to date. At most places you rent you are constantly corralling children and keeping tabs on them, but the staff at tiger rock take care of that for you since they are in the business of instructing and leading the class. As a parent, I was able to sit back and actually enjoy a birthday party and socialize with other parents. Everyone had a great time and it wont be soon forgotten. Even if you are not a student, you can have an enjoyable party without the stress here.

name: Brett Riley
text: I have never had any experience with martial arts until I signed my son up over a year ago and I am so glad I did. While learning self-defense is an obvious part of Tiger-Rock they also focus just as much on self-discipline, and respecting others. Every single person on this staff  is incredible! I highly recommend you stop by for a visit and give it a try.

name: Jill Odom
text: This Tiger Rock is fantastic. The staff is friendly and encouraging. They drive you to be your very best in a positive way. Your fellow classmates will quickly begin to feel like family. Excellent place to go if you're looking for a sweat-inducing workout.

name: Lacey Moses
text: I enrolled my son here about a year ago and I have not a single regret this is just the most wonderful karate studio! Mr. Holt is an excellent leader and role model, he has more than met my expectations for karate instruction for my son and helping adjust his attitude. If you are considering enrolling your child in karate you will not be disappointed. There are great class schedules, we were able to make 6 classes a week (my son needs it). Comfy atmosphere with a keurig if that's your thing and outdoor seating for when the weather is pleasant.

name: Stacy Lawrence
text: Signing our son up has been the best decision we have ever made! The instructor's are amazing! They have all become more like family! Our son loves Tiger Rock and looks forward to going! That says alot! We will forever be grateful to them for all that they have done! :)

name: shenanigann
text: Tiger Rock is a great, family-oriented place to learn about martial arts and grow as a person. There are very friendly and personable instructors who will guide you along your journey to black belt. I always have an awesome workout and great fun in classes. It's a good way to meet people from all walks of life, and the classes are tailored to meet your specific needs no matter if you are 4 years of age or 94.

name: Jodie More
text: Mr. Holt and his team of instructors are the absolute best! My son has been enrolled for only 4 months and I've seen a great change in him already. The staff goes beyond teaching taekwondo and teaches them how to be good people.  I can't say enough good things.

name: Kati McCarthy
text: Tiger Rock has taught my son discipline, coordination, focus, respect and self control-- all things we work on at home. It's wonderful to have such an excellent place to send him to get exercise while instilling the same values, all while having fun with friends. Worth every penny.

name: Noah Watson
text:
I won my 2nd place medal in a tournament thanks to Sensei Holt for his teaching and kindness to us students. I would never trade this place for another dojo because of him and his assistants.
Mr Holt is the sensei and I appreciate that he has taught me a lot about karate. He is a very kind hearted man and loves to spread knowledge about karate. I regret that I didn’t finish my training when I was really young. I love sensei Holt and his teaching. The place is  growing with young students.

name: Ashley Simpson
text: The staff is wonderful and they are great with kids.

name: Amy Davis
text: I cannot say enough positive things about Bailey's Tiger Rock Northport. Our daughter loves the classes and activities. Their schedule meets everyone's needs. Their tuition prices are VERY reasonable, and most importantly, ALL of their instructors are wonderful with the students. The instructors are patient, kind, and are constantly interacting with the kids, whether it's during class or not. You can tell that they want to be there and it shows.

name: Joyce Bush
text: We've been members of Tiger Rock for over a year. My child absolutely loves it. The staff is inviting and professional. I'm glad we chose Bailey's Tiger Rock Martial Arts.

name: Tess Jones
text: I have been working out at the Northport TKD  location with Master Holt for 18 years. I absolutely love Mr. & Mrs. Holt. All of the students over the years are like family to me. Best place for a great workout, learning life skills for kids and learning how to defend yourself no matter how young or how old. It's the greatest. Moma Jones

name: Deven Snyder
text: Tiger Rock Martial Arts has some of the most professional staff and educated instructors around.  The facilities extremely modern with safe and clean equipment.  This is the place you want to bring your child to succeed in all their endeavors.  They also have an excellent adult program which is exciting and a great workout.

name: Lindsey Hewett
text: We LOVE it here! This has been so incredible for my son and husband. The instructors are wonderful, really care about the students. It's so much more than just Taekwondo; we're a family.

name: Michelle Moss
text: Tiger Rock Northport has been a huge part of our lives for almost 7 years now! I have watched my son go from a 4 year old cub to a 3rd degree black belt! He has grown physically, mentally, and emotionally through his training. I am beyond thankful for the leadership of the instructors who have poured into him and played a part in this journey! Definitely one of the best decisions we have made for him!

name: David Schafe
text: We have been involved with Bailey's TKD for 10 years this month and have known the Bailey family for 20 years.  The training and discipline that our daughter has learned is amazing.  As a student you will always be encouraged as well as challenged in every part of the martial arts journey.  You will not find a better place for building your child's character, integrity and well being.  We have received a better return on our investment with Baileys TKD than any other sport any of our children have been involved in.

name: Tina Smith
text: My son has been going for six months and loves it.  They are all good with the students.

name: Kai Hamm
text:
It is a lot of fun, I'm very glad I joined. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful!
Besides the self defense tactics & skills I learned, I also learn about when to us it.
Definitely recommend it to try it out, I wasn't sure at the beginning, but everybody is welcomed there in a fantastic manner.
Ps: it's also a fantastic workout!!

name: Krissy Stevenson
text: We have been a part of the Tiger Rock family for seven years. Tiger Rock Northport is amazing! Awesome instructors, great atmosphere, and tons of fun.

name: Laura Stephens-Reed
text: My son has been going to Tiger Rock for four months. He loves it, and I love that he is not only getting good exercise and gaining skill but also learning important social and emotional lessons from caring but firm instructors.

name: Katy Busby
text: I can not say enough wonderful things about Tiger Rock! The staff is always engaging with the students not only during class but also before and after class. My son has transformed since starting at Tiger Rock!

name: kristi mullis
text: My son started Tiger Rock almost 4 years ago. We moved here to Northport from Georgia and wanted him to be involved in some kind of sport, and baseball, football, basketball was to no interest to him. This place was a daily ride by on our commute home and one day stopped by to check it out. My sons exact words were "I'm not good at karate", we signed him up that day at Tiger Rock and our son has never looked back. He was a shy, to him-self kind of kid and let's just say he's nothing like that today. He LOVeS this place and you can find him there every chance we can get him there. He has learned so much here and all that he has learned and more will follow him to his adult years and beyond. He is a great kid and very genuine person. I love all the coaches and the owner of Tiger Rock.

name: Jacob Comans
text: This is an awesome establishment with wonderful instructors. Nothing but positive experiences with the staff, facilities, and teachings.

name: John LaGrone
text: Affordable Decks

name: james campbell
text: Thea is the absolute best martial arts experience you will get here in Birmingham. Topnotch and caring teachers!

name: Rebecca McCalman
text: Our Son has been enrolled at USA Martial Arts for the past 7 years. It has been an amazing experience! What we love about USA Martial Arts is how much passion they have for not only teaching Martial Arts, but for character development of their students. They teach the importance of respect, honesty, bravery, anti-bullying, the right kind of self-defense,  what it means to be a team player, the importance of doing your best at school, taking care of your body and so much more! If you are looking for a place where your child can learn Martial Arts and self-development from instructors that treat them like family, then USA Martial Arts is hands-down the place to be. It is without a doubt,  one of the best decisions we have made for our son.

name: Jessica Mitchell
text: I joined the adult Aikido program about 5 years ago and it has been amazing. The classes are fun, the instructors are attentive and kind, the other students are fantastic, and it makes me happy to be there. This environment is supportive and challenging, but not overwhelming. There are students who have been studying martial arts for years as well as new comers, like myself, who just wanted to try something different. I can't recommend it enough.

name: Reese McGill
text: The instructors are great at explaining the techniques in martial arts, as well as teaching the importance of teamwork and becoming better as a person. I've been here for about 3 years now, and this place has always had such a positive atmosphere. To anyone wanting to learn more about any type of martial art, I would definitely recommend you at least check this one out.

name: Lindsey Gray
text: USA Martial Arts is absolutely the best!!! My child started out  participating in there Little Dragon Program, moved up over the years and is now a Red Belt working on his Qualifiers to become a Black Belt. Not only has he learned so many Self Defense skills but he has also gained an amazing amount of Life skills as well! Everyone there has been wonderful.

name: Melissa Richey
text: Our son began taking lessons at USA Martial Arts ago after another student recommended. We have been very happy with our experience so far. The instructors have extensive experience, are very patient, and are great role models for the students. Our child is learning martial arts skills, respect, and life skills through their training. Highly recommend this Dojo!!

name: Akers of Books
text: Our daughter has been at Bluff Park Dojo for almost 2 years and has absolutely loved it!  We have been so impressed by how they not only care about her martial arts development, but also her development as a person.  It is such an encouraging environment!  We could not be more pleased!

name: Kristi Cerice
text: We can not say enough about how much we love this dojo.  The instruction is top notch and the life lessons are even better.  The staff are great with kids and keep it challenging but fun.

name: Sarah Moody
text: This karate school is such a gem! My two kids have been going for about three years, starting at age 5 and 8 (if I’m remembering right). The teachers are wonderful, and the approach is very focused on character development. They are consistent and deeply link the character lessons with the practice. My kids love it and have learned so much!

name: Ingrid Seymour
text: Absolutely love USA martial arts. Best of all, my child loves it. He wants to be there early to make sure he doesn’t miss a thing. They teach more than just Karate. They also teach values and lessons for success and focus, and it’s all done by caring instructors with excellent martial arts skills. Highly recommended.

name: Farrah Alcorn
text: I highly recommend USA Martial Arts to anyone looking for a great martial arts experience. The instructors are wonderful, teaching respect and responsibility in addition to martial arts.  My boys can’t wait to go to class each week.

name: Rachel Butler
text: Our daughter has learned so much here! I am impressed every week by the patience that is shown by her instructors, the skills that she is acquiring, and the confidence that seeps into outside life. Thank you for all that you do!!!

name: Heather Coley Chahine
text: I cannot recommend the Little Dragons program enough.  The self-defense skills, discipline, respect, and overall confidence this program teaches young children is amazing.  Examples of some skills I've seen taught:  how to escape if a stranger grabs you, how to address adults, the need to look others in the eye when speaking or listening, cleaning your room, falling so you will not hurt yourself, how to treat those around you, how to listen appropriately, counting in multiple languages, and when to speak.  All of this is so patiently and kindly taught that the children have fun and immense respect for their senseis.  As a parent, I'm inspired by the straight forward teaching methods and have incorporated some of the ideas into our home.  Other things:  no hidden fees, small class sizes, personal interactions with the children and families, and a dojo that encourages building a community between the students, families, and school.

name: Erin Mooney
text: We love USA Martial Arts!  It is our home away from home!  My son is a better person because of the amazing program Mr. Keith provides!

name: Kristin H
text: This is a wonderful place with amazing instructors! They are so patient and positive and we have loved taking karate there!

name: Ryan Hoerl
text: This is a great dojo if you’re looking for a easy going and no pressure atmosphere to learn martial arts. If you feel that martial arts is something you’re to old or out of shape, come by and try the Aikido classes. I started at 36 and my wife at 48 and that was 5 yrs ago.
